getCmdOptions

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCmdOptions()
extra params, these will be passed directly to the Java Object/FTL, so you can use this to override key/values from the ini files very useful if you're calling the workflow from another system and want to pass in arguments on the command line rather than ini file
